attributes.action: Allow Lawrence Goudie aka Goudie or Big Red to stay in the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lawrence Goudie is an upstanding member of the community who has provided his friends a Ginga to laugh at when times are tough. The man is an institution at the Red Back and the place and the consturction industry would become weak at the knees without him

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
